content: The feedback we've received on ComfortEase garments from trainers and patients continues to underscore that the product's design features improving ease of use, comfort and fit have substantially enhanced the patient experience, especially for the large portion of our patients with bilateral lymphedema in the lower extremities with limited mobility.
